SaveSVG example

Example SVG below.

In this SVG, the black line (link) connecting the circle and the square uses a style from 'css/styles.css'.

The circle and the square are generated using <use xlink:href=""></use> tags.
The xlink:href attribute points to the file containing the definitions and the id of the symbol to be fetched e.g. 'images/monos.svg#glcnac'
